articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Headquarters of Large Combined Unit of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Headquarters of Large Combined Unit of KPA
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, inspected the Headquarters of Large Combined Unit 966 of the KPA.
					 He was greeted by the commanding officers of the unit on the spot.
					
					 He waved back to the cheers of its service personnel and had a photo session with them.
					
					 He went round the monument to the on-the-spot instructions of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, the monument to the autograph of Kim Jong Il, the revolutionary museum and the room devoted to the history of the unit.
					
					 Seeing the historical relics and data showing the devoted efforts made by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for rounding off the combat readiness of the unit and bolstering up its combat capability, he looked back on the course of victory and glory covered by it.
					
					 Looking at photos of successive commanding officers one by one, he said that there were many anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters among the commanding officers of the unit, indeed, and added that this fact alone clearly tells what great importance Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il attached to the unit.
					
					 He listened to the report on the defence operation plan from the commander of the unit at the operational command room and went round the military study room, firing hall and various other places to learn in detail about the training and combat readiness.
					
					 Noting that the unit has a very important duty to perform, he set forth tasks that would serve as guidelines for increasing the combat readiness and capability of the unit in every way.
					
					 He went round a mess hall, swimming pool, bath house and various other places to take warm care of the living of service personnel as their real father would do.
					
					 He enjoyed a performance given by the art squad of the unit at the soldiers hall.
					
					 He expressed his satisfaction with the successful performance staged by the members of the art squad with numbers sensitively reflecting party policies and gave instructions which would serve as guidelines for their performing activities.
					
					 He expressed expectation and conviction that all service personnel of the unit would maintain full combat readiness and thus firmly defend the socialist country with arms.
					
					 Accompanying him were KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the KPA General Political Bureau, and Army Col. General Ri Yong Gil, first vice-chief of the KPA General Staff and director of the General Operational Bureau.

articles.title: Views Exchanged between DPRK and China
articles.content:
Views Exchanged between DPRK and China
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Institute for Disarmament and Peace of the DPRK Foreign Ministry had an exchange of views with officials of the Institute for International Studies of China in Beijing from Feb. 25 to March 1.
					 At their meeting, they had discussions on the DPRK-China relations and the matters of the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korea's Absurd Sophism against DPRK over Its Citizen's Death abroad Blasted
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korea's Absurd Sophism against DPRK over Its Citizen's Death abroad Blasted
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- It is half a month since Kim Chol, a citizen of the DPRK bearing a diplomatic passport, died in Malaysia on Feb. 13.
					 The cause of his death has not yet been clearly identified but the U.S. and the south Korean authorities are groundlessly blaming the DPRK, asserting that he was intoxicated by highly poisonous VX nerve substance.
					
					 The absurdity of the U.S. and the south Korean authorities' assertion and lack of its scientific accuracy and logical coherence are proven even by comments made by experts and media of other countries.
					
					 It is view of chemists of many countries that even a drop of VX may claim deaths of tens or hundreds of people and it has strong permeability and stability as its properties. They asserted a claim that the woman suspect was safe because she washed her hands at a washroom does not correspond with the chemical property of VX. They added that even if the persons suspected of murder had been injected with atropine, basic antidote of VX, they might have fallen into shock and that even if they had worn gloves, this fatal substance would have been extremely dangerous. It is, therefore, the height of absurdity to claim that the person who applied VX, a substance fatal to the life even in case of inhalation of a tiny amount of it or its touch of skin, was left unaffected and the person to whom it was applied met a death, they asserted.
					
					 World media query that if component of VX was allegedly detected from Kim Chol's eyes and lips, the ambulance that carried him and police who guarded him must have all been intoxicated and if so, the airport should have been closed but it is still in operation.
					
					 Experts on international law and analysts said that under a regulation of the international organization on ban on chemical weapons, a final conclusion on the results of analysis of chemical weapons can be drawn only on the basis of the identical results of analysis made by at least two specialized laboratories, stressing that the recent case should have been reported to the organization and the relevant sample should have been analyzed at a lab designated by the organization. They further contended that if the use of VX were true, it would be necessary to probe where the substance was from, who made it and who handed it. Drawing any conclusion about VX without any concrete study would be unscientific and if some countries try to use it for other political purposes, the consequences will be beyond imagination, they warned.
					
					 Some media suspect that in view of the fact that the women arrested as suspected murderers had visited south Korea several times in the past, it is highly possible that the south Korean authorities let them carry the said substance. This is by no means fortuitous.
					
					 Almost all countries have scrapped chemical weapons under the convention on ban on chemical weapons but only the U.S. and some other countries still possess the said substance. What is all the more problematic is the fact that the U.S. is introducing into south Korea all kinds of chemical weapons.
					
					 This being a hard fact, the U.S. and the south Korean authorities are kicking up an anti-DPRK smear campaign, groundlessly pulling it up.
					
					 From the beginning the south Korean authorities spread rumor that the "death of Kim Chol was intoxication by two women secret agents sent by General Reconnaissance Bureau of north Korea" and "their dead bodies will appear", causing confusion and driving a wedge between the DPRK and Malaysia.
					
					 Lately they tried to use Kim Chol's death for their stepped-up racket of "human rights" against the DPRK and floated the story about "use of chemical weapons" or "use of WMD" by someone in a bid to create atmosphere of "international criticism" of the DPRK.
					
					 The reckless moves of the U.S. and the south Korean authorities are aimed to meet the dangerous political purpose to tarnish the image of the dignified DPRK and bring down the social system in it. This is clear to everyone.
					
					 The danger and gravity of the problem lie in that the story about "use of chemical weapons" touted by the U.S. and the south Korean authorities has something in common with the story of "Iraq's possession of weapons of mass destruction" spread by the U.S. in the 1990s.
					
					 It is the final aim sought by the U.S. to stir up international repugnancy towards the DPRK, lay an international siege for putting pressure on it and provoke a nuclear war against the DPRK at any cost.
					
					 The U.S., however, is mistaken.
					
					 Should the U.S. and the south Korean authorities keep resorting to political chicanery to bring down the social system in the DPRK, being lost to reasons, the DPRK will be compelled to take stronger measures for self-defence in order to protect the sovereignty and dignity of the country.
					
					 The U.S. and its vassal forces should not run amuck, clearly understanding the strategic position of the DPRK as a nuclear power.

articles.title: Joint Agreement of Christians in North and South of Korea
articles.content:
Joint Agreement of Christians in North and South of Korea
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Christian Federation of Korea and the National Council of Christian Churches in south Korea issued a joint agreement on Wednesday, the 98th anniversary of the March First Popular Uprising.
					 The joint agreement said that March 1, 1919 was a historic day when the Korean nation turned out and staged a patriotic resistance against Japan to retake the sovereignty of the country usurped by the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 The March First uprising was a massive one which demonstrated the spirit of independence of the Korean nation to stand against the outsiders' colonial domination and tyrannical rule and its indomitable will and stamina to win back the independence of the country, it said, and went on:
					
					 It is nearly one century since the uprising, but the security and peace of the nation are still seriously threatened by outsiders.
					
					 The Korean nation faces an important task to firmly defend the peace of the Korean peninsula and the security of the nation and open up a broad avenue to improving the north-south relations through the concerted efforts of all its members by inheriting the spirit of national independence as was displayed during the days of the uprising.
					
					 Vowing to work with dedication to reject aggression-minded outsiders, defend the nation's independence and peace and usher in a new phase of national reunification, the Central Committee of the Christian Federation of Korea and the National Council of Christian Churches in south Korea express their will as follows on the 98th anniversary of the March First Popular Uprising:
					
					 1. The Christian Federation of Korea and the National Council of Christian Churches in south Korea will conduct a dynamic drive to wrest apology and reparation for all crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists against the Korean nation, including the crimes related to the sexual slavery, to put an immediate end to the visit to Yasukuni Shrine, the distortion of history, attempt at seizing Tok Islets, the revision of "Pacifist Constitution" and the bolstering of "Self-Defence Forces" and check Japan's militarist revival and reinvasion moves.
					
					 2. They will vehemently oppose all forms of war drills for aggression staged in collusion with outsiders and make all efforts for independence, peace and reunification of the nation.
					
					 3. They will conduct various solidarity activities for improving north-south relations and opening up a decisive phase for independent reunification by the concerted efforts of the nation and exert efforts for holding a meeting of north-south religionists at an early date as an immediate task so that the north and the south may jointly commemorate the 100th anniversary of the March First Popular Uprising.

articles.title: Rason Orphans' Secondary School Completed
articles.content:
Rason Orphans' Secondary School Completed
Rason, March 1 (KCNA) -- There took place an inaugural ceremony of Rason Orphans' Secondary School on Wednesday.
					 The three-storied school, built in Tongmyong-dong of Rason Area, has all conditions for education and living such as multi-function classrooms, room of children's union, labs and practice rooms, hostel, gymnasium and dining room.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Rim Kyong Man, chairman of the Rason City Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, teaching staff of the school, orphans, builders and working people in the city.
					
					 Jo Jong Ho, chairman of the Rason City People's Committee, made an inaugural speech.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, orphans entered the school amid warm welcome.

articles.title: New Stamp Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamp Issued in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- An individual stamp carrying a Korean map figured by a tiger was issued in the DPRK.
					 The pictorial map was created in the 1920s as part of the protest against the Japanese imperialists who had been desperately keen on depriving the Korean people of even their names and mother tongue after occupying Korea.
					
					 During their colonial rule over Korea, the Japanese imperialists likened the shape of the Korean map to a weak rabbit in a bid to depress the anti-Japanese consciousness of the Korean nation.
					
					 But the Korean people illustrated the Korean map with a valorous Korean tiger, the king in the mountains. In the map, the tiger’s backbone represents Great Paektu Mountains and its black lines depict its branch mountains.

articles.title: New Technology for Raising Sharp Persimmon Trees Developed
articles.content:
New Technology for Raising Sharp Persimmon Trees Developed
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- A research group of the Bioengineering Branch of the State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK succeeded in developing a technology for raising sharp persimmon trees on the basis of tissue culture.
					 Sharp persimmon is rich in sugar, protein, organic acids and vitamin C.
					
					 The research group solved sci-tech problems arising in germination by culturing growing points, ascertainment of various nutriments and their optimum concentration, etc.
					
					 Tissue-cultured saplings were transplanted in different fruit farms and the rates of their rooting and acclimatization reached nearly 100 percent.

articles.title: Fermented Mung-bean Drink, Natural Health Foodstuff
articles.content:
Fermented Mung-bean Drink, Natural Health Foodstuff
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Many kinds of popular health foodstuffs have been produced in the DPRK.
					 Among them is the one made by the method of fermenting a mixture of mung-bean, milk powder and sugar with lactobacillus. As it has an effect of detoxification, it is regarded to be efficacious for malfunctions of the liver and kidney.
					
					 It also helps promote metabolism, prevent cerebral and cardiovascular system diseases, treat inflammatory diseases of the digestive system and skin diseases and recover from mental and physical fatigue. And it is believed to be good for children's growth.

articles.title: Japan's Reparation for Past Crimes Demanded
articles.content:
Japan's Reparation for Past Crimes Demanded
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Almost one century has passed since Japan committed such crime against humanity as indiscriminately suppressing or massacring more than 100,000 Koreans who shouted for the independence of Korea in peaceful demonstration but it has gone unpunished.
					 The Korean Committee on Measures for the Sexual Slavery for Japanese Army and Drafting Victims issued a statement Wednesday on this occasion.
					
					 It said:
					
					 Looking back on the scars that remain unhealed, the records of crimes, we are reminded once again of the militarist and imperialist nature of Japan that has remained unchanged despite the change of centuries and the replacement of generations.
					
					 Even some days ago, the chief Cabinet secretary of Japan made remarks denying the forcible drafting of Korean women as sexual slaves, Tok Islets, part of Korea's territory, were marked as territory of Japan in textbooks for the younger generation and a court allegedly protecting the Constitution denied without hesitation the right of the Korean students in Japan to national education.
					
					 Far-fetched assertions were made demanding the removal of girl statues depicting a sexual slave for the Imperial Japanese Army standing in other's land and the theory of "preemptive attack on missile bases in north Korea" is being openly advocated.
					
					 The situation clearly proves that Japan is not feeling guilty at all of aggression and crimes against humanity committed in the past but is making hurried preparations for reinvasion, buoyed by the militarist ambition and the ambition to take revenge that far surpass those expressed in the last century.
					
					 Failure to draw a lesson from the past wrongdoings is bound to cause bigger sins, and ensuing consequences will be disastrous.
					
					 Japan should clearly know that if it fails to draw a lesson from its crime-woven history and follows in the footsteps of its criminal ancestors, it will fall into the bottomless abyss of ruin.
					
					 We will certainly force Japan to pay due price for all sorts of misfortune, pain and losses it inflicted on Korea and its people century after century, and will wage a strenuous struggle till reparation is made before history.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Conservative Group's Efforts to Stay in Power
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Conservative Group's Efforts to Stay in Power
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- With the impeachment of Park Geun Hye fast approaching, the south Korean conservative group has reached the extremes in its desperate efforts to delay it.
					 Under the patronage of the traitorous party, conservative gangsters' organizations have become evermore pronounced in their fascist hysteria to crack down the candlelight rallies as "riot of communists". They have gone the lengths of openly agitating terrorism, assassination and military coup to turn the situation around, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article, and goes on:
					
					 Their sinister action aimed at stay in power is an intolerable mockery and challenge to the enraged candlelight demonstrators.
					
					 If the conservative group's ambition to stay in power is realized, the result of the south Korean people's candlelight action will be trampled down again.
					
					 The south Korean people keenly realized under the Park's reign of four years that their demand can never come true under the treacherous politics pursued by the puppet group of conservatives.
					
					 The massive candlelight action against the regime that rages furiously in south Korea is an expression of profound curses and anger at the conservative group which pursued the treacherous politics in utter disregard of the desire of the people for independence, democracy and reunification.
					
					 The south Korean candlelight action has already sentenced not only traitor Park Geun Hye but also the puppet conservative group to death.
					
					 It is absolutely unallowable for the south Korean people to see the conservative forces coming to power again as they have been subject to all kinds of misfortune and pain for four years under traitor Park's rule.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun: U.S. Fear Is Proof of Victory of DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun: U.S. Fear Is Proof of Victory of DPRK
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Americans are now beset by fear and uneasiness as the DPRK has developed and completed a new strategic weapon system, comments Rodong Sinmun Wednesday.
					 Citing relevant facts, the commentary goes on:
					
					 The faster the DPRK is remarkably bolstering up its nuclear deterrence, the more sharply Americans' fears of their security is increasing. This is a clear proof of the great victory of the DPRK.
					
					 Historically fear has been a thing belonging to others while pleasure and satisfaction to the U.S.
					
					 The wicked and mean history is being shaken to its roots.
					
					 The U.S. and other hostile forces are raising cries of distress without caring about decency in the face of the indomitable will and spirit of the DPRK dashing at supersonic speed, beyond the universally accepted speed of strategic weapon development.
					
					 The present U.S. administration should understand that both time and justice belong to the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. may find itself in a tighter fix if it is set to approach the DPRK as before.
					
					 The test-fire of "Pukguksong-2" (North Star) ballistic rocket, a DPRK's powerful nuclear strategic weapon, gave the following warnings to the U.S.
					
					 First, the sanctions will never work on the DPRK, Songun Korea dynamically advancing with the spirit of self-reliance and self-development as the dynamic force.
					
					 Second, the U.S. is bound to sustain a defeat in the missile confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK will continue to build up the military capability for self-defence, the pivot of which is the nuclear force, and the capability for preemptive strike as long as the U.S. pursues its hostile policy towards the former.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Sneers at Japan's Pro-U.S. Submissive Behavior
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Sneers at Japan's Pro-U.S. Submissive Behavior
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- As reported, Japanese Prime Minister Abe paid a three-day visit to the U.S. from February 10 and had talks with Trump. To curry favor with him, Abe supported the infrastructural construction project such as high speed railway construction in the U.S. and proposed an agreement on investment for helping it create 700,000 jobs, etc. as gifts.
					 During U.S. Secretary of Defense Mattis' less than 24 hour stay in Japan, the Japanese prime minister, the chief Cabinet secretary, the foreign minister and the defense minister vied with each other to hold talks with him.
					
					 Commenting on the facts, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says:
					
					 This shows that the U.S.-Japan relations are those between the master and servant and Japan is a colony under the U.S. military occupation.
					
					 The U.S. and Japan are often touting their relations as "blood ties" but they are nothing but the master-servant relations.
					
					 It is the scenario of the U.S. to turn Japan into a militarist state, war state, again to make it serve the purpose of carrying out the former's strategy for dominating Asia-Pacific.
					
					 Japan is not blindly toeing the U.S. policy as a servant without seeking its purpose. Its intention is to realize its dream of becoming a military giant and realizing its wild ambition for reinvasion depending on the U.S.
					
					 Praising the U.S. as "apostle of peace," Japan is vociferating that the U.S. pro-active involvement in international affairs is indispensable for "international peace" and "stability".
					
					 Deplorable, indeed, is the position of Japan as its regime has to toe the U.S. line just to please its master.

articles.title: No One Can Check Dynamic Advance of DPRK: Minju Joson
articles.content:
No One Can Check Dynamic Advance of DPRK: Minju Joson
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and its followers are making desperate efforts to block the revolutionary advance of Juche Korea dashing ahead, rallied close around the great party with one mind and intention in order to realize the beautiful dream and ideal of building a powerful socialist country.
					 As there is a saying that a dog's bark will never make a camel go astray, the DPRK has confidently advanced along the road of independence, Songun and socialism chosen by itself according to its own timetable, says Minju Joson Wednesday in a commentary. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 There are manifold hardships and difficulties owing to the U.S. military pressure and vicious sanctions. But this can never undermine the trust of the army and people of the DPRK in their leader and their revolutionary faith in their idea and cause.
					
					 The Korean people have achieved big successes startling the world while racing against the time at Mallima speed.
					
					 Any people without confidence in validity and victory of their cause can never make such miraculous successes.
					
					 This goes to clearly prove that things and path the DPRK does and takes are correct and will lead them to victory.
					
					 Achieving one great victory after another is the traditional fighting method and creative stamina of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 No one can prevent Juche Korea from making dynamic revolutionary advance with the single-minded unity and self-reliance and self-development as the dynamic force the under the wise leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Papers Call for Ushering in Golden Age of Nationwide Reunification Movement
articles.content:
Papers Call for Ushering in Golden Age of Nationwide Reunification Movement
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- DPRK newspapers Wednesday carried editorials on the 98th anniversary of the March First Popular Uprising which left a significant trace in the history of national liberation as the nationwide anti-Japanese patriotic uprising for independence and sovereignty against the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule.
					 Rodong Sinmun says all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad should turn out as one in the struggle to smash the challenge and obstructive moves of the separatist forces at home and abroad, with the same mettle and spirit as were displayed by the patriotic forerunners, and achieve the country's reunification, the supreme desire of the nation.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The anti-reunification confrontational maneuvers of the U.S. and its vassal south Korean warmongers are a stumbling block to the national reconciliation and unity and reunification of the country.
					
					 The reality shows that all Koreans in the north and the south and overseas are urgently required to courageously turn out in a nationwide struggle for resolutely smashing the frantic challenge of the separatist forces at home and abroad and opening up a turning phase for the national reunification under the banner of national independence.
					
					 The entire Korean nation at home and abroad should intensify the struggle for putting an end to the U.S. imperialists' presence in south Korea that has lasted for decades.
					
					 They must mete out a merciless punishment to the anti-reunification pro-U.S. lackeys who are keen on nothing but pro-U.S and submission, challenging the national unity and the cause of reunification.
					
					 They should also thoroughly smash the reinvasion moves of the Japanese reactionaries becoming undisguised day by day and the dangerous maneuvers of south Korean lackeys following the Japanese reactionaries.
					
					 Minju Joson calls for opening up a new phase of independent reunification this year through the nationwide struggle with the pride and honor of having the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu as the sun of the nation and the lodestar of national reunification.

articles.title: Bird Flu Breaks out Again in S. Korea
articles.content:
Bird Flu Breaks out Again in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Bird flu has broken out again in Seoul and South Jolla Province of south Korea, according to media reports.
					 It was confirmed on Feb. 24 that a dead white-fronted goose in Seoul was infected with a bird flu virus.
					
					 The outbreak of the disease in Seoul is the third case this year.
					
					 As to South Jolla Province, the virus was also found at a duck farm in Kangjin County near a stock farm where the virus was found on Feb. 21.

articles.title: Committee for Erecting Girl Statue of Peace Formed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Committee for Erecting Girl Statue of Peace Formed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations, students organizations, schoolchildren's organizations, lawmakers, elders, citizens and other people from all walks of life in Kwangju City of south Korea formed a promotion committee for erecting a girl statue of peace in the North District of Kwangju with due ceremony on Feb. 22, according to the south Korean online paper Jaju Sibo.
					 Speakers at the inaugural ceremony noted that they organized a preparatory committee at the end of last year and, since then, have conducted information activities for settling the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army and achieving peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The organization decided to erect the girl statue of peace on August 15 in order to lay bare the Japanese imperialists' history of aggression and hype the meaning of Korea's liberation, division and peaceful reunification.

articles.title: S. Korea: Puppet Regime's Policy of Environment and Energy under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korea: Puppet Regime's Policy of Environment and Energy under Fire
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean paper Hangyore on Feb. 22, academic circles and experts of south Korea contended that the Park Geun Hye group's policy of environment and energy totally failed.
					 They said that the policies of safe management of atomic power plants and climate and atmospheric control were in bad shape.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Stop Reckless Acts
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Stop Reckless Acts
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee made public a statement Wednesday in denunciation of the south Korean puppet authorities running amuck in the anti-DPRK confrontation racket, frightened by the successful test-fire of the surface-to-surface medium to long-range ballistic missile Pukguksong-2.
					 The statement said:
					
					 All the military steps taken by the DPRK in its territorial land, air and waters are the exercise of the legitimate right to self-defence to counter the persistent and brigandish nuclear threats and blackmail of the U.S. and its vassal forces.
					
					 It is a wanton violation of the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK to call the test-fire "provocation, challenge and threat" in a hysteric response.
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to stop ridiculous moves of branding the DPRK's measure for self-defense as "provocation" and mind their own chaotic internal affairs.
					
					 They should clearly understand that the army and people of the DPRK will not use the precious nuclear weapons, which they built with much effort, just against the puppet group of traitors.
					
					 The new U.S. administration should not be too much concerned about the regular measures for bolstering up capabilities for self-defense taken by the DPRK, a country far away across the ocean from the U.S., a shameful behavior unbecoming for the "super power", but be wise to be concerned more about its good administrative beginning so as not to follow in the regretful footsteps of its preceding administration.
					
					 Not only the south Korean authorities but also all the hostile riffs-raffs keen on anti-DPRK confrontation moves should not act rashly. 
					
					 Invariable is the stand of the DPRK to continuously bolster up the military capabilities for self-defense the pivot of which is a nuclear force and the preemptive attack capability unless the U.S. and south Korea give up their ambition for aggression evidenced by war drills staged at the doorstep of the DPRK under the veil of annual ones.
					
					 The DPRK will continue to make legitimate and responsible efforts to protect the sovereignty of the country, vital rights of the nation, peace of the Korean peninsula and security of the region, no matter what others may say.

articles.title: Massacre of Civilians by Army and Police Disclosed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Massacre of Civilians by Army and Police Disclosed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The Jinju Association of Bereaved Families of Civilians Killed before and after the War in south Korea set about unearthing to probe the truth behind mass-killings of civilians by troops of the puppet army and police during the wartime, according to Yonhap News on Feb. 26.
					 When they were fleeing south, terrified by the attack of the People's Army in July 1950, the south Korean puppet army and police killed more than 2 000 inhabitants including those related to the Association of the Protected between July 22 and 26.
					
					 The Jinju Association started the unearthing of remains on Ryongsan Hill in Myongsok-myon, Jinju City of South Kyongsang Province, together with a joint investigation team involving different civic and public organizations in February 2014.
					
					 At that time the team discovered remains of 39 people and many bullets and cartridges.
					
					 The investigation team decided to do unearthing again 20-odd meters away from the site of the first unearthing, according to the testimonies made by residents and bereaved families that remains of 718 people are buried in the three valleys of Ryongsan Hill.

articles.title: Korean Resident in U.S. Dismisses "Story about Torpedo Attack by North" as Sinister Plot
articles.content:
Korean Resident in U.S. Dismisses "Story about Torpedo Attack by North" as Sinister Plot
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- An article by a Korean resident in the U.S. was posted on the website of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. on Feb. 23, dismissing the misinformation about "Cheonan" warship incident spread by the south Korean authorities.
					 The article said that there is not a single south Korean who believes what their defense ministry publicized.
					
					 It recalled that the fishing boat and its crew, who were involved in picking up wrecks of the torpedo, disappeared in the sea while working in other waters at the request of the navy, causing suspicions, adding it was hardly understandable that not a single body was found and a horrible plot was presumed to have been hatched.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Angola
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Angola
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Personages of Angola issued statements on February 14 to mark the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The international secretary of the Youth Organization of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola noted that Kim Jong Il performed immortal exploits for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence and turned the DPRK into a powerful country of independence and a military power.
					
					 The director of the International Affairs Department of the Committee of Angola for Friendship and Solidarity with Peoples paid high tribute to Kim Jong Il, saying:
					
					 Kim Jong Il had taken warm care of the Korean people with the politics of love.
					
					 Under his leadership the DPRK secured the position of a powerful country which big powers dare not provoke.
					
					 The West should recognize this stark reality today.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Algeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Algeria
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The Tarzalt Publishing House in El-Djezair of Algeria brought out in pamphlet leader Kim Jong Il's work "Socialism Is a Science" on February 15 to mark the Day of the Shining Star, his birth anniversary.
					 The work, published on November 1, Juche 83 (1994), clarifies the idea that Korean-style socialism based on the socialist theory of Juche is the most scientific and vital one. And it refers to the principled matters arising in defending socialism.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Observed in Nigeria
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Observed in Nigeria
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Events were held by political parities, organizations and institutions of Nigeria between February 1 and 21 to celebrate the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They included joint celebration meeting, seminar, book and photo exhibition and film show.
					
					 Displayed at their venues were photos showing the revolutionary careers of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Taking part in the events were personages of the Nigerian National Preparatory Committee for Celebrating the 75th Birth Anniversary of the Great Generalissimo HE Kim Jong Il, the People's Democratic Party, the People's Progressive Party, the Better Nigeria Progressive Party, the National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and other political parties, organizations and institutions and popular masses of Nigeria.
					
					 A congratulatory message to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the joint celebration meeting.

articles.title: DPRK Leaders' Feats for Army Building Lauded Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK Leaders' Feats for Army Building Lauded Abroad
Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Organizations in Nigeria and DR Congo posted articles on their websites on Feb. 7 and 8 to mark the 69th anniversary of the development of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army into regular revolutionary armed forces by President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in its article elaborated on the fact that President Kim Il Sung had stepped up the building of regular armed forces after the liberation of Korea, basing himself on the experience in army building gained during the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo said in its article:
					
					 Attaching great significance to the building of regular armed forces, President Kim Il Sung had wisely led the work to build the Juche-based defence industry.
					
					 The DPRK's defence industry, he built from scratch, looking far into the future of the country, had been further strengthened by leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Under the energetic leadership of Kim Jong Il, the DPRK's defence industry developed into a self-reliant defence industry able to turn out any modern weapons and military hardware much more in quantity and quality.
					
					 The DPRK opened up a new phase in the development of its defence industry under the distinguished guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Korean People's Army is now displaying its might as the invincible revolutionary army equipped with modern offensive and defensive means thanks to the Juche-based defence industry provided and developed by Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona comandancia de la gran unidad combinada 966 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona comandancia de la gran unidad combinada 966 del EPC
Pyongyang, primero de marzo (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono la comandancia de la gran unidad combinada 966 del EPC.
					Le acogieron en el terreno los comandantes de la unidad.
					
					El Comandante Supremo respondio al saludo de los oficiales y soldados que le aclamaban y se fotografio con ellos.
					
					Paso revista al monumento a la visita de orientacion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, la lapida con la firma del Dirigente, el museo de la historia revolucionaria y la sala de presentacion del historial.
					
					Viendo atentamente los objetos y datos de interes historico- revolucionario exhibidos que dejan conocer las huellas de direccion abnegada y esfuerzos incansables de los grandes Lideres por completar los preparativos de pelea y mejorar la combatividad de la unidad, el recordo la trayectoria de desarrollo de ella que recorrio la senda siempre victoriosa y gloriosa.
					
					Mirando las fotos de los sucesivos comandantes, dijo que entre ellos, hay muchos ex combatientes revolucionarios antijaponeses y este hecho testimonia que los grandes Lideres concedian mucha importancia a esta unidad.
					
					Tras escuchar en la sala de mando de operaciones el informe sobre el plan operacional de defensa dado por el comandante de la unidad, el Maximo Dirigente se cercioro del estado de entrenamiento y de movilizacion para el combate realizando un recorrido por la sala de estudio de asuntos militares, el centro de tiro y el puesto de servicio de operacion telefonica, etc.
					
					Calificando de muy importante la mision de la unidad, presento las tareas que serviran de guia en mejorar por todos los medios los preparativos de pelea y la combatividad de ella.
					
					Recorriendo el comedor, la piscina, el bano y otros puntos, atendio con afecto paternal las condiciones de vida de los militares.
					
					Este dia, el presencio en la sala de los militares una funcion ofrecida por el grupo de propaganda artistica de la unidad.
					
					Muy contento de que los miembros del grupo hayan ofrecido una funcion excelente con las obras que reflejan bien las politicas del Partido, dio instrucciones relativas a sus futuros espectaculos.
					
					Finalmente, expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que todos los oficiales y soldados de la unidad se mantendran en la perfecta disposicion de movilizacion para defender firmemente con fusiles la patria socialista.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, y el coronel general de las fuerzas terrestres Ri Yong Gil, primer subjefe y director general de operaciones del Estado Mayor General del EPC.

articles.title: Delegacion coreana intercambia opiniones bilaterales con la parte china
articles.content:
Delegacion coreana intercambia opiniones bilaterales con la parte china
Pyongyang, primero de marzo (ACNC) -- La delegacion del Instituto de Desarme y Paz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea intercambio desde el 25 de febrero hasta el primero de marzo en Beijing, China, las opiniones bilaterales con los funcionarios del Instituto de Estudios Internacionales de China. 
					En la ocasion se discutieron los problemas sobre las relaciones RPDC-China y otros de la Peninsula Coreana y de la region del Nordeste Asiatico.

articles.title: Rechazan acusacion absurda de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea en el caso de ciudadano muerto
articles.content:
Rechazan acusacion absurda de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea en el caso de ciudadano muerto
Pyongyang, primero de marzo (ACNC) -- Paso una quincena desde el 13 de febrero cuando murio en Malasia nuestro ciudadano Kim Chol quien portaba pasaporte diplomatico.
					Si bien no se ha aclarado todavia la causa de su muerte, EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas acusan absurdamente a la RPDC insistiendo en que el fue envenenado por la         "altamente toxica sustancia nerviosa VX".
					
					Las valoraciones al respecto de los especialistas y medios de prensa de otros paises comprueban lo absurdo y la falta de argumento cientifico y logica de la insistencia de EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas.
					
					Los quimicos de muchos paises opinan que VX tiene fuerte permeabilidad y seguridad y una sola gota de esta sustancia puede causar la muerte de decenas y cientos de personas, por eso, resulta contradictorio decir que la mujer, arrestada como sospechosa del asesinato, salio ilesa porque se lavo las manos en un bano publico. Agregan que aunque las sospechosas del asesinato se hubieran inyectado la atropina, antidoto principal de VX, se habrian dado un choque. Aun en el caso de que la hayan usado con guantes, resulta tambien extremada peligrosa esa sustancia mortifera, especifican. Es el climax de sofisteria decir que salio ilesa la persona quien supuestamente, ha untado la mano con esa sustancia, que causa el peligro de vida por la ingestion de la minima cantidad o el contacto de piel, pero si murio la otra a quien fue aplicada la misma, evaluan.
					
					Los medios de prensa del mundo reportan que si fue extraida la sustancia VX en los ojos y labios de Kim Chol, esto significa que fueron intoxicados el personal medico de la ambulancia, que le ha transportado, y todos los policias que le custodiaban. Como se puede explicar la operacion continua del aeropuerto que debio haber sido cerrado si fuera tan grave el incidente, ironizan.
					
					Los especialistas en el derecho internacional y los analistas insisten en que el reglamento de la organizacion internacional de prohibicion de armas quimicas estipula que la conclusion final sobre el resultado de analisis de un arma quimica debe basarse en la misma conclusion que se de al menos en mas de dos laboratorios especializados. Por lo tanto, hay que informar el presente caso a la organizacion internacional de prohibicion de armas quimicas y enviar la muestra correspondiente a los laboratorios indicados por ella, senalan y aseveran que si fuera verdad el uso de VX, hay que averiguar de que pais se ha introducido esa sustancia y quien la ha hecho y quien la ha transferido. No seria cientifico definirla como VX sin hacer estudios detallados y si algunos paises tratan de emplear el incidente en otro objetivo politico, se produciran consecuencias inimaginables, advierten.
					
					No es casual que algunos medios de prensa sospecharan la posibilidad de que las autoridades surcoreanas les hayan entregado esa sustancia a las sospechosas del asesinato, al tomar en cuenta el hecho de que ellas estuvieron en varias ocasiones en el Sur de Corea.
					
					En virtud del convenio de prohibicion de armas quimicas, casi todos los paises cancelaron estos artefactos, pero EE.UU. y algunos paises tienen la sustancia mencionada y el imperio ha emplazado en suelo surcoreano las armas quimicas de varios tipos.
					
					Pese a los hechos arriba mencionados, EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas recurren obstinadamente a su histerica e intrigante campana contra la RPDC acusandola sin razonamientos.
					
					Desde el principio, las autoridades surcoreanas crearon confusion difundiendo rumores falsos como que "Kim Chol murio envenenado por 2 agentes del Buro General de Reconocimiento del Norte de Corea" y "apareceran los cadaveres de ellas". De esta manera, intentaron sembrar cizanas entre la RPDC y Malasia.
					
					Ultimamente, tratan de utilizar la muerte de Kim Chol en su campana anti-RPDC en la esfera de DDHH y crear la atmosfera de "condena internacional" a la RPDC con la version sobre el "uso de armas quimicas y las otras de exterminio masivo".
					
					Resulta evidente que tal conducta imprudente persigue el peligroso objetivo politico de manchar la imagen de la muy digna RPDC y derrocar su regimen.
					
					Lo peligroso y grave del problema reside en que el rumor de "uso de armas quimicas", que difunden EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas, es identico al otro de "posesion de armas de exterminio masivo por Iraq" preconizado por EE.UU. en la decada de 1990.
					
					El imperio tiene la meta final de crear en la arena internacional el veto y el cerco de presion contra la RPDC y desatar a toda costa la guerra nuclear contra ella.
					
					Pero, EE.UU. esta equivocado.
					
					Si EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas siguen recurriendo al complot politico para derrumbar el regimen de la RPDC, esta tomara las medidas de autodefensa mas fuertes para defender su soberania y dignidad.
					
					EE.UU. y sus satelites deben actuar con prudencia al ver bien la posicion estrategica de la RPDC que se ha situado en la primera fila de potencias nucleares.

articles.title: CCPAP exige la prudencia a los titeres surcoreanos
articles.content:
CCPAP exige la prudencia a los titeres surcoreanos
Pyongyang, primero de marzo (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que se torna cada dia mas imprudente el alboroto conflictivo anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de los titeres surcoreanos, pasmados ante el exitoso lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico estrategico tierra-tierra de largo y mediano alcance del tipo Pukguksong-2, el portavoz del Comite Coreano por la Paz de Asia y el Pacifico (CCPAP) hizo publica hoy una declaracion que sigue:
					Todas las medidas militares que toma la RPDC en su tierra, aire y agua jurisdiccionales constituyen el ejercicio legitimo de la soberania para hacer frente al chantaje y amenaza nucleares y la campana de aislamiento y aplastamiento anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y sus satelites.
					
					Censurarlas como "provocacion", "desafio" y "amenaza" constituye una flagrante violacion de la soberania y dignidad de la RPDC.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos han de arreglar la situacion deplorable de su casa en vez de calumniar como "provocacion" las justas medidas de autodefensa de la parte connacional. 
					
					Deben conocer que la RPDC no usara las armas nucleares fabricadas a cambio de ingentes esfuerzos para la simple tarea de aniquilar a la horda de traidores surcoreanos. 
					
					La nueva administracion estadounidense no debe actuar vergonzosamente, inconforme a su honra de "superpotencia", prestando en vano demasiada atencion al fortalecimiento ordinario de la capacidad de autodefensa de un Estado soberano, situado allende del oceano, sino tomar la opcion sensata de no repetir el ignominioso antecedente de su predecesora. 
					
					Deben dejar de actuar con imprudencia tambien otros fulanos y menganos que se muestran fanaticos en los actos hostiles y conflictivos anti-RPDC. 
					
					Es invariable la posicion de la RPDC de seguir fortaleciendo la capacidad de autodefensa nacional y de golpe preventivo centrada en las fuerzas armadas nucleares, mientras que EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos no abandonen su ambicion de agresion librando los ejercicios belicos con la excusa de que es una tradicion efectuarlos ano tras ano.
					
					Digan lo que digan otros, continuaran nuestros esfuerzos justos y responsables para defender la soberania del pais, el derecho a la existencia de la nacion, la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y la seguridad de la region.
